name: Ceramic cutter
description: Electrical instrument used for cutting any ceramic product. It comes with a table and a power supply

name: Oscilloscope
description: Electronic test instrument that graphically displays varying signal voltages, usually as a two-dimensional plot of one or more signals as a function of time

name: Xbox with Kinect + games
description: Xbox console with auxiliary device Kinect, that allows the player to play games with sensor
